review:
here is a review of the movie mujhse fraaandship karoge(2011)

'an underrated which succeeds on winning your heart.'

ratings: 4.5/5

story: vishal(saqib saleem) and preity(saba azad) must set aside their never-ending-dispute and team up to organise a function together while chatting on facebook being someone else unknowingly that they are chatting with each other. 

what's good: basically everything. the movie always tips you with a laugh or two. the whole new approach towards the concept of the movie. the movie giving a message is damn good and acting.

what's bad: a clich√® ending(which is just fine) and that the movie could explore many things more.

bore part: none

review: the movie is something i wish to see again and again. it is that good. i personally felt that this movie is highly relatable and fun.

suggestion: it is one of those sweet movies so don't expect mass and fighting.

to watch or not to watch: watch it for saqib and fun comic.

                                       a hasan's review

mujhse fraaandship karoge 
it is that one underrated film which could have hit the box-office given it's time of release. 
the film eventually takes it's start and while going on none of it's part make you to pause the movie. 

the movie is my favorite rom-com ever made given all of the rom-com ever made at this point. 

saqib and saba did a fabulous acting throughout the film making it the finest piece of a bollywood film. 

what's good in the film :
basically everything. the movie always tips you with a laugh or two. the whole new approach towards the concept of the movie. the movie giving a message is damn good and acting.

it's a must watch film.

ratings : 10/10
